item.title: Chicken add a quote by Joseph Campbell
item.description: "We must be willing to let go of the life we planned so as to have the life that is waiting for us." -- Joseph Campbell

item.title: Chicken add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Good friends, good books, and a sleepy conscience: this is the ideal life." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Chicken add a quote by Yves Saint Laurent
item.description: "Over the years I have learned that what is important in a dress is the woman who is wearing it." -- Yves Saint Laurent

item.title: Chicken add a quote by Michael Altshuler
item.description: "The bad news is time flies. The good news is you're the pilot." -- Michael Altshuler

item.title: Chicken add a quote by Joan Crawford
item.description: "Don't fuck with me, fellas. This cowgirl has been to the rodeo before." -- Joan Crawford

item.title: Chicken add a quote by Bessie Anderson Stanley
Chicken add a quote by James Bryce
item.description: "The worth of a book is to be measured by what you can carry away from it" -- James Bryce

item.title: Chicken add a quote by Joe Ryan
item.description: "There’s nothing to match curling up with a good book when there’s a repair job to be done around the house." -- Joe Ryan

item.title: Chicken add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Chicken add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "When someone shows you who they are believe them; the first time." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Chicken add a quote by Cary Grant
item.description: "Insanity runs in my family, it practically gallops" -- Cary Grant

item.title: Chicken add a quote by Herb Ritts
item.description: "Being an American is about having the right to be who you are. Sometimes that doesn't happen." -- Herb Ritts

item.title: Chicken add a quote by Kathleen Norris
item.description: "Just the knowledge that a good book is awaiting one at the end of a long day makes that day happier." -- Kathleen Norris

item.title: Chicken add a quote by Jorge Luis Borges
item.description: "I have always imagined that Paradise will be a kind of library." -- Jorge Luis Borges

item.title: Chicken add a quote by John Muir
item.description: "This grand show is eternal. It is always sunrise somewhere; the dew is never dried all at once; a shower is forever falling; vapor is ever rising. Eternal sunrise, eternal dawn and gloaming, on sea and continents and islands, each in its turn, as the round earth rolls." -- John Muir

item.title: Chicken add a quote by Lewis Carroll
item.description: "Why, sometimes I've believed as many as six impossible things before breakfast." -- Lewis Carroll

item.title: Chicken add a quote by Deepak Chopra
item.description: "You will be transformed by what you read." -- Deepak Chopra

item.title: Chicken add a quote by Gregg Allman
item.description: "It's hard to live your life in color, and tell the truth in black and white." -- Gregg Allman

item.title: Chicken add a quote by Wendell Berry
item.description: "The soil under the grass is dreaming of a young forest, and under the pavement the soil is dreaming of grass." -- Wendell Berry
